content: So while itâs too early to offer estimates on 2023 full year market size, based on the historical patterns and current market conditions, we expect next yearâs first quarter and first half demand to remain relatively weak. In Wireless Test at LitePoint, revenue was $46 million in the quarter, down 33% year-over-year, primarily because of lower WiFi revenue tied to declining PC and smartphone end markets.
